name: Evie
description: A girl crashed into a dark forest not knowing where to go, curiosity drives her to open a Pandoraâ€™s box that was never meant to be opened.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 (or AMD equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750ti (or AMD equivalent) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Yes Additional Notes: SSD highly recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 (or AMD equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (or AMD equivalent) DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Yes Additional Notes: SSD highly recommended, 97% or above sRGB monitor recommended
